transcript.sentence: A college student wearing a backpack walks down a long hallway with crutches.
Title says a stroke of endurance.
Shot of a student's face with a worried, annoyed expression.
Fade to white
flashback of students sitting at a kitchen table with her mother.
Fade to white
shot of student in hallway. Again changes to flashback of sign saying disabled and capable disability club meeting today, 1:30 pm.
Shot of a group of students to with wheel chairs.
One of the students is with crutches.
Students waved to the student with crutches as they pass her in the hallway.
Fade to white
EVA in a classroom with an older woman professor.
Fade to white shot of a sign saying bookstore changes to flash back of another class with an older male professor with long hair and a suit.
EVA walking in the hallway with an annoyed expression.
Another older woman sees her and gives her a side. Glance changes to flash back over the older woman's office.
Shot of ava walking in hallway fades to present day shot of slightly younger professor with short hair.
He points to the board where he has written the word neural plasticity shots of students.
A vote in front of a computer.
Shot of a sign on a classroom door saying biology class is canceled today.
EVA walks up to two students who are looking at the sign, sadly.
Shot of ava walking away changes to shot at ava with the two students with wheel chairs.
Shot of signs saying faith works changes to shot of a younger girl in a wheelchair and her able bodied friend as EVA walks in.
Words on screen, say three weeks later changes the shot of professor ben
slowly limping into the classroom. As the students look at him. In stunned silence, he leans on a desk at the front of the room.
Shot a professor ben writing on the board.
As he looks up, it changes to blurry spinning shot at the ceiling.
Professor ben puts his hand over his eyes.
Professor ben suddenly falls against the desk in distress.
Professor ben tries to turn his body and falls to the floor shots of students' reactions.
Professor ben sits on the floor. Shots of students looking down at him from his point of view.
Students help professor ben off the floor and over to a chair.
EVA turns her head away from professor ben
fade to black.
Professor ben walks into the classroom.
Professor ben walks to the front of the classroom limping.
EVA trust to put her coaches on as she stands up and drops one.
Shot of crutch landing on the floor.
EVA picks up her crutch, shot a professor ben with disappointed expression, fade to black.
Shot of EVA with young woman in a wheelchair.
Shot of classroom. A student stand up to leave.
Professor ben smiles that lips over to a desk and sits in a chair, exhausted.
Professor ben attempts to pick up a cup with the hand affected by the stroke, and suddenly drops the cup and spilling water onto the desk.
EVA handsome, a paper towel. Professor ben tries to wipe up the water.
EVA walks to the side of professor ben and takes her crutches off.
A bird does a graceful arm movement. Professor ben tries to imitate it.
He is uncoordinated, but his movement get smoother each time.
EVA picks up one crutch, but has told picking up the other.
Professor ben stands and helps her.
EVA leaves scene changes to EVA and a hallway on her cell phone.
Scene changes to EVA in front of a computer.
Fade to black credits roll.

result.title: A Stroke Of Endurance - A Film by Margot Cole
result.description:
A Stroke Of Endurance" a film by Margot Cole, the writer and director of “Drama Sighted” http://cripvideoproductions.tumblr.com/post/46603999144/drama-sighted-margot-cole-2011-synopsis-a 
“Only Those Who Limp Allowed”  http://cripvideoproductions.tumblr.com/post/57671638127/only-those-who-limp-allowed-a-short-film-written  and “Crips Not Creeps” http://cripvideoproductions.tumblr.com/post/109840448686/crips-not-creeps-enhanced-visual-quality-version . 

Crip Video Productions presents a story of friendship,faith and endurance…A college student with Cerebral Palsy named Ava, and her classmates must deal with the physical and emotional ramifications when their professor has a stroke that leaves him disabled in the middle of the semester when they least expect it. 
 
The disabled characters in this film are all portrayed by actors with disabilities. The use of the word “Crip” in “Crip Video Productions” is not meant as an offense to anyone associated with these films or otherwise. We have full permission to use the locations seen in the film. Crip Video Productions’ mission is to increase understanding of disability through storytelling. “A Stroke Of Endurance” is the sole property of Margot Cole/Crip Video Productions.  
More information and accessible versions of our work, can be found at http://cripvideoproductions.com  and at http://cripvideoproductions.tumblr.com
